metadata.title: CVE-2024-20696 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Windows libarchive Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-20696` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libarchive-tools - 3.6.0-1ubuntu1.3
libarchive13 - 3.6.0-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.0-1ubuntu1.3').
